name: DANANN
description:
In an ancient Ireland, humans discovered how to use lightning as a power source, and tried to develop this technology. However, the gods didn't approve this progress, and banished the people developing that new technology. One goddess, Morrigan, rose against her kin and helped the banished. Along her people, she swore to come back. You play as Cú Chulainn, champion of Morrigan, to reclaim your homeland by defeating the mother goddess Danu. Use your spears wisely to triumph over her!

 This game is a boss rush, composed of a single boss fight.

This game was made by a group of 6 second year students of E-artsup Bordeaux, within 4 months of production.

Game Designers / Programmers : Noah Boisard, Art Michel

Game Artists : Nolwenn Grole, Diane Lemercier, Prune Martin, Gaetan Perraudin

Under the supervision of : Antonin Congy, Tony Gimazane, Renaud Ory, Chloe Ravallec
